doc.title: Barbie: Mermaid Adventure
doc.plot: Barbie Mermaid Adventure takes Mermaid Barbie underwater for a celebration with her friend Samika, a sea horse. Unfortunately, the light from the "Magic Shell" has faded, and Barbie must help her mermaid friends find it before the party can get started. Players will meet sea horses, send out party invitations, follow rainbow trails, and participate in seven different activities during a dolphin hunt
